oneLine: I have been working with productbox for over 3 and a half years. I have wore multiple hats at times, including Backend Tech Lead, Full Stack Engineer, Associate Full Stack Engineer, and Junior Full Stack Developer. Some of my experiences includes:
bullets: Leading the development team in designing and implementing scalable and efficient backend systems, utilizing Node.js, Serverless Computing, and other technologies to build robust and fault-tolerant systems.

Designing and developing scalable and efficient full-stack applications using Node.js, Serverless Framework, and other technologies, and implementing RESTful APIs, ensuring adherence to best practices and security protocols.

Contributing to the development of multiple web applications, enhancing their robustness, fault tolerance, and scalability, using Node.js, React, Serverless, and AlpineJS to build user-friendly web applications and APIs for all platforms.

Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including DevOps, UI/UX designers, QA, and clients, to ensure seamless project execution, and utilizing Agile methodologies to foster efficient communication and adaptation.

Gaining experience in a range of technologies, including MySQL, Express.js, Firebase Authentication, Python's OpenCV, and Flutter, and utilizing Git for peer-programming, reviewing, and troubleshooting.

oneLine: Industry Insights, Academic Excellence: My Contribution to IM Sciences as Corporate Board Advisor:
bullets: During the first meeting I and along with other with other industry leaders collaborated to provide strategic guidance and insights to IMSciences.
We in an open discussion broke down and updated the curriculum that contribute to skills development for new graduates, ensuring market relevance and competitiveness

oneLine: As a Microsoft Student Ambassador, I empowered students and educators to leverage technology and innovation, fostering a community of digital leaders and change-makers.
bullets: Conducted hands-on training sessions and webinars on Microsoft products and technologies, such as Azure, PowerBI, GitHub, and Figma, to enhance students' technical skills and knowledge.
Provided guidance and support to students on their projects and research, helping them to develop innovative solutions using Microsoft technologies.
Collaborated with student organizations and faculty members to promote Microsoft's initiatives and programs, increasing awareness and adoption of Microsoft technologies on campus.
Developed blog posts, videos, and tutorials to share knowledge and best practices on Microsoft products and technologies, making them accessible to a wider audience.

Served as a liaison between Microsoft and the academic community, providing feedback and insights on Microsoft's products and services, and helping to shape the company's strategy for education and research.

oneLine: As a Junior Flutter Developer Intern, I contributed to the development of mobile applications using Flutter, while also mentoring and training a group of junior developers in the fundamentals of Flutter, helping them to develop their own mobile apps.
bullets: In addition to my development responsibilities, I was also tasked with teaching a group of junior developers the fundamentals of Flutter, including its architecture, widgets, and state management
Created and delivered a comprehensive training program, including lectures, coding exercises, and project-based learning
Contributed to the development of mobile applications using Flutter, a cross-platform framework
Participated in code reviews and ensured adherence to best practices and coding standards
